TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VersioningHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods to aid developers in writing version-safe code. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is intended to facilitate the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string MakeVersionSafeName (string name, System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope from, System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope to);
.method public static hidebysig string MakeVersionSafeName(string name, valuetype System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope from, valuetype System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope to) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a version-safe name based on the specified resource name and the intended resource consumption source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The original name is returned with a scope related suffix. The suffix may include the process identity, the current <xref:System.AppDomain> identity, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string MakeVersionSafeName (string name, System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope from, System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope to, Type type);

.method public static hidebysig string MakeVersionSafeName(string name, valuetype System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope from, valuetype System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope to, class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The beginning of the scope range.
The end of the scope range.
Docs.summary: Returns a version-safe name based on the specified resource name, the intended resource consumption scope, and the type using the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The original name is returned with a scope related suffix.

Docs.exception: The values for and are invalid. The resource type in the enumeration is going from a more restrictive resource type to a more general resource type.
